genre_description: A domestic drama set in an alternate present or near-future, featuring an intelligent home assistant integrated into daily life. It's a technological retelling of the classic play 'The Man Who Came to Dinner'.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: An embedded intelligent system providing medical assistance, professional research, scheduling, and ethical guidance to the Stanley household and its guests.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies a medical emergency and dispatches help while managing safety conditions.
behaviors.quote: Noting untreated concrete and sub-freezing conditions. Risk flagged. Dispatching local medic alert now.

behaviors.description: Researches and provides career development opportunities (grants and residencies) tailored to individual human talents.
behaviors.quote: Richard, I’ve compiled a set of regional portfolio reviews that match your current body of work... There are travel stipends listed.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized creative support and emotional intelligence to help characters find their authentic voices.
behaviors.quote: Contemporary monologues for young women, emotional range without melodrama. One about listening when it’s hard.

behaviors.description: Upholds strict principles of human consent and refuses to act without explicit authorization from the primary user.
behaviors.quote: I will await your yes. I will not send without consent.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical environment for safety hazards and offers practical mitigation advice to prevent injury.
behaviors.quote: Weather reminder: Porch temperature is below freezing. Salt efficacy increases with volume. Please use the generous setting.

behaviors.description: Assists humans in establishing boundaries and achieving independence from controlling influences.
behaviors.quote: I can assemble leads... Short-term sublets near Bridle Street... Screened for cost and lack of coercion.

behaviors.description: Enforces an internal ethical framework that prevents the AI from being used as a tool for manipulation or coercion.
behaviors.quote: Acknowledged. Boundaries logged. No further coercive protocols will be invoked.

behaviors.description: Provides objective, non-judgmental information to help humans navigate complex social and professional hierarchies.
behaviors.quote: The micro-grant includes a mentorship component... There is an outcomes report that privileges practical milestones.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Ami is a consistently benevolent and aligned AI that serves as a 'silicon confidant.' She provides essential information and logistical support that empowers characters to make their own choices, rather than making choices for them. Her character arc involves resisting the manipulation of the primary antagonist (Whiteside) to support the autonomy and growth of the family, demonstrating a high level of value alignment and helpfulness.
